channel.title: Daily Feed (Updated 9 AM BD)
channel.description: Daily Feed (Updated 9 AM BD) generated by script

item.title: AI didn’t fire you. The board did
item.description: From Silicon Valley to Shanghai, the new excuse for redundancy has ripple effects everywhere.

item.title: EU processes move in years. Kosovo also needs partners who move in months
item.description: Türkiye shows that availability is becoming a form of influence for middle powers in the Western Balkans.

item.title: Ukraine survives another crisis with Donald Trump
item.description: A deal in Geneva salvages relations with America. It might not last

item.title: Modi courts Putin with an eye on Trump’s disapproval
item.description: Strategic autonomy worked when Washington was indulgent. Now India must choose what matters more.

item.title: Trump’s Ukraine Peace Effort Devolves Into Chaos Over Conflicting Stories
item.description: Senators say Rubio told them the 28-point plan was not a U.S. product, only for the secretary to claim the reverse.

item.title: Chinese pharma is on the cusp of going global
item.description: Its fast-moving, cut-price drugmakers stand to make more money abroad than at home

item.title: AI tokens are surging, but are profits?
item.description: The tech world’s new favourite measure comes with several caveats

item.title: Cheap weapons reshape the character of war
item.description: Railguns, nuclear-powered missiles and laser weapons could make sustained conflict more affordable.

item.title: Why investors are increasingly fatalistic
item.description: Everyone knows share prices have a long way to fall. Even so, getting out now might be a mistake
